Title: FTToolkit for WinRT
Description: FTToolkit for WinRT is the Windows RT Version of FTToolkit. The framework is designed for using in Metro Style Apps on Windows 8
HomeWiki:
Project Description
FTToolkit for WinRT is the Windows RT Version of FTToolkit. The framework is designed for using in Metro Style Apps on Windows 8


This is the WinRT version of FTToollkit (fttk.codeplex.com) and it is designed for using in Metro Style Apps.
It is developed using Visual Studio 2012 RC.

It is in alfa version!!!
